project: Autonomous Financial Coach for Gig & Informal Workers
track: Build an autonomous financial coaching agent that adapts to real user behavior, spending patterns, and income variability - helping gig workers, informal sector employees, and everyday citizens make smarter financial decisions proactively.
description: Our agent continuously observes user income, spending, and behavior patterns, then proactively generates personalized financial recommendations — save now, expect shortfall, adjust budget — without user prompting. It learns from feedback and adapts strategies over time, delivering a fully autonomous financial coaching agent built for financial resilience in variable-income populations.
